channel.title: NullRs 667 - Come any join us today - looking for staff
channel.description:
[url=http://nullrs.smfnew2.com/index.php]NullRS - Index[/url] [url=http://nullrs.smfnew2.com/index.php]NullRS - Index[/url] [url=http://nullrs.smfnew2.com/index.php]NullRS - Index[/url]
NullRs is a server made by player for the players. Nothing is changed in our server without a poll being up for it. We are based on the poanizer project source but a lot is changed.
Credits: Poanizer 80% - for build a exellent source and helping me learn with his guide Me 20% - changing some of the code, fixing some bugs, editing price and more.
Features:
Pvm: -Nex -Corp -GWD (no killcount) -Tormented Demons -Evil Chickens -Steel Kiwi Boss -Nomad (Custom Cb) -DKS -Lucien -Ice titans -Sea Troll Queen -Poanizer -Matey -Barrelchest -Glacors -Jadinkos -Polypores
PvP: -Safe pvp -Clan wars (safe/dangerous) -Death Match Arena -Wilderness Pking -DZ pvp
Skilling: -Semi low Rate (Non combat) -All skills avaliable -Max cape rewarded when maxed
Donatorzone: -Donator skilling zone -Skilling benefits -Donator Only Items
Other: -Comp cape requirements -Acc backups -IPLock -Rest area -Charm collector ring -Crystal key chest -Ring of welth/Life/Invincability -Custom NPCS -Rare drop messages -Personal kill counter -Bank tabs -Server time on Quest tab -daily updates -active staff -stable vps with ddos protections. -Dicing/Flowers -Working Pets -Warriors Guild -Castle wars -Clan wars -Safe Pvp -Pvm -pvp -Skilling (all skills) -Donator Benefits. -Comp cape -Pvm Kill Count list -Fire cape -Chaotics -Custom items -Drygores
Some Photos from the server
Home
[img]http://i.imgur.com/rdKmZvG.jpg[/img]
Shops
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/faRCHpN.jpg[/img]
pvm kill counter
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nlzfrKW.png[/img]
working comp cape req
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4ftbNGT.png[/img]
loads of commands
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cnD0xHT.png[/img]
kalphite king with drygore drops (multi)
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/O6maAUF.jpg[/img]
and much much more, come join us at [url=http://nullrs.smfnew2.com/index.php]NullRS - Index[/url]
hope you enjoy our server, HunterAgent, Owner of NullRs

NullRs is a server made by player for the players.
Nothing is changed in our server without a poll being up for it.
We are based on the poanizer project source but a lot is changed.

Credits:
